product information:
With an images aspect ratio of 16:10, the HP f2105 provides enhanced viewing area for enjoying HD content. This HP 21-inch monitor features a brightness of 300.0 cd/m2 and 900:1 contrast ratio for more sharp, vivid and lively pictures. The maximum resolution of 1680 x 1050 in this HP LCD monitor produces excellent quality images. The 16 ms response time in this HP 21-inch monitor produces flawless image transitions while viewing 3D images or playing games. The maximum viewing angle of 178 degrees vertical and horizontal both in this HP LCD monitor gives clear visibility from almost any side. The HP f2105 is energy efficient with a power consumption of 90.0 Watt in operating and 2.0 Watt standby mode.
